Title: Tooth and Claw
Plot:
Location: Torchwood House, Scotland, Earth Date: 1879 
Enemies: Werewolf, The Monks

Landing in 1879, Scotland, the Tenth Doctor and Rose meet Queen Victoria, travelling with her to spend the night at the Torchwood Estate. However, a group of warrior monks have sinister plans for the monarch, and the full moon is about to summon a creature out of legend.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Some scenes may scare very young children
GuestStars: Ruthie Milne, Spencer Hawken, Ron Donachie, Pauline Collins, Ian Hanmore, Derek Riddell, Michelle Duncan, Jamie Sives, Tom Rob Smith
